name: Thought Worm I
text: You implant a minor suggestion within the target creature’s psyche that makes it less inclined to resist mental intrusion. The target creature takes a –2 penalty on Will saves against all mind-affecting spells and effects for the duration of the spell.
text_zh: 你将一个微弱的暗示植入到目标生物的精神中，让他减少对抵抗精神入侵的抵抗。在法术持续时间内，目标在对抗所有影响心灵的法术和效果的意志豁免上承受-2减值。
